page.title: 08Pubs
page.content: The profit from the drinks in the Avon Mill was 50% in the Barley Mow it was 33%. The best business days are Friday, Saturday and Sunday. The Avon Mill was made into a pub, in 1939 it was not a mill. The Barley Mow was made into a pub in 1891. The best selling drink in the Avon Mill is lager and in the Barley Mow is bitter. The best selling beer in the Avon Mill is brew 11 and the same in the Barley Mow. It costs Â£35,000 a year to run in the Avon Mill and in the Barley Mow it varies. In the Avon Mill there are 17 workers and in the Barley Mow there are 11.
